title: Luxury apartment available 9/1 (DVI Astoria) - no broker fee
posting_body: ['Hi,', 'I am moving to Miami so leaving my one bedroom in the DVI Astoria.', 'I am looking for someone to take over my lease on or before 9/1.', '(NOTE I have not 100% solidified my move-out date but will know for sure in the next couple weeks.)', 'The apartment is on the 6th floor and has a balcony, washer/dryer, and dishwasher.', 'Central heating and AC.', 'Great views of Manhattan and amenities including gym, work room and rooftop.', 'Rent is on a one-year lease is $3116.44/mo (utilities and internet not included.', 'Building has Fios.)', "There is a $20 non-refundable application fee; I'll just be sending you to the management company to complete this.", 'Here are some links that share photos of a similar unit and the building.', 'Contact me to come see it in person.', '<URL>/', '<URL>', "**Unit is unfurnished, but I'm not taking all of my furniture, so if you want something I can leave it for you."]
